product_name: Native Eyewear Vim Polarized Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With two pairs of interchangeable lenses, the Native Eyewear Vim Polarized Sunglasses protect your eyes and give you a clear view ahead even as the light changes from bright sun to cloudy. Snap-Back(TM) Interchange lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. Frames come with gray polarized lenses which are ideal for full-sun days and Sportflex(TM) orange-yellow lenses for cloudy, overcast days. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity, and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Lightweight frames are flexible and durable enough to withstand high-velocity collisions; built-in venting enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Nonslip nose pads and ear stems; cam-action spring hinges; soft case included. The Native Eyewear Vim Polarized Sunglasses best fit large faces. Closeout.
short_description: With two pairs of interchangeable lenses, the Native Eyewear Vim Polarized Sunglasses protect your eyes and give you a clear view ahead even as the light changes from bright sun to cloudy.
